text: xallxhˌ khux phuthrng thahı phændin ni pen thi phanak kæ phwk cea læa chan fa pen phedan mankhng læa thrng thahı phwk cea pen ruprang læa thrng thahı ruprang khxng phwk cea swyngam læa thrng prathan paccay yangchiph cak sing thi di «kæ phwk cea nan khux xallxhˌ phracea khxng phwk cea dangnan xallxhˌ phracea hæng sakl lok thrng careiy ying
